mapper.sql: id, member_id as memberId, number, pay_order_number as payOrderNumber, house_id as houseId, task_id as taskId, state, total_price as totalPrice, discounts_price as discountsPrice, pay_price as payPrice, type, data_status as dataStatus, create_date as createDate, modify_date as modifyDate
mapper.select:
SELECT bo.id, bo.member_id as memberId, bo.number, bo.pay_order_number as payOrderNumber, bo.house_id as houseId, bo.task_id as taskId, bo.state, bo.total_price as totalPrice, bo.discounts_price as discountsPrice, bo.pay_price as payPrice, bo.type, bo.data_status as dataStatus, bo.create_date as createDate, bo.modify_date as modifyDate FROM dj_pay_business_order bo LEFT JOIN dj_deliver_order AS o ON o.business_order_number = bo.number LEFT JOIN dj_deliver_order_item AS oi ON oi.order_id = o.id where bo.member_id = #{memberId} and bo.state !=1
and o.house_id = #{houseId})
and (oi.product_id = #{queryId} or oi.worker_goods_id = #{queryId})
GROUP BY bo.id ORDER BY bo.create_date desc

SELECT a.id AS id, a.number AS orderId, CONCAT( c.residential, IFNULL(c.building, '*'), '栋', IFNULL(CONCAT(c.unit, '单元'),'' ), IFNULL(c.number, '*'), '号' ) AS houseName, c.member_id AS memberId, d.mobile AS mobile, a.pay_order_number AS payOrderNumber, a.total_price AS totalAmount, a.discounts_price AS redPackAmount, a.pay_price AS actualPayment, b.create_date AS createDate, a.type AS type, a.state AS state, a.task_id AS taskId, b.pay_state AS payType, s.store_name storeName FROM dj_pay_business_order AS a LEFT JOIN dj_pay_pay_order AS b ON b.number = a.pay_order_number LEFT JOIN dj_house AS c ON a.house_id = c.id LEFT JOIN dj_member AS d ON d.id = c.member_id LEFT JOIN dj_store s ON FIND_IN_SET( c.village_id, s.villages ) WHERE a.data_status = 0
and a.state = #{state}
and ( d.mobile like CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%') or CONCAT( c.residential, IFNULL(c.building, '*'), '栋', IFNULL(CONCAT(c.unit, '单元'),'' ), IFNULL(c.number, '*'), '号' ) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%') or a.pay_order_number like CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%') or a.number like CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%'))
ORDER BY b.create_date DESC

SELECT it.product_sn AS productSn, it.product_name AS productName, it.image AS image, it.price AS price, it.shop_count AS shopCount, it.total_price AS totalPrice, it.worker_goods_sn AS goodsSn, it.worker_goods_name AS goodsName, it.unit_name AS unitName, IFNULL( it.product_type, 2 ) AS type FROM dj_deliver_order AS o INNER JOIN dj_deliver_order_item AS it ON o.id = it.order_id WHERE o.business_order_number = #{number} GROUP BY o.business_order_number, it.product_sn, it.worker_goods_sn ORDER BY it.product_sn DESC,it.worker_goods_sn DESC
